name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TravIt - Travel Itinerary in your calendar

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple and lightweight browser extension that adds a send-to-calendar button to the online Google Maps application.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple and lightweight browser extension that adds a send-to-calendar button to the online Google Maps application
